column4: Is it possible to dual boot dapper and edgy, with the same /home ?
Great, I already have /home in a separate partition... thanks
it is if Edgy doesn't make any Dapper incompatible settings.
let's hope so. Anyway, I'm already using a home directory that I keep rsynced across three computers, one of them Dapper and two of them different releases of Debian... no problems yet :-)
